props.code:
pnpm add vue-router

# 基于文件系统的Vite路由生成器
pnpm add vite-plugin-pages -D
# Vue布局插件的Vite
pnpm add vite-plugin-vue-layouts -D

# 进度条
pnpm add nprogress

props.code:
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import '@/router/permission'

const app = createApp(App)
app.use(router)
app.mount('#app')

props.code:
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import '@/router/permission'

const app = createApp(App)
app.use(router)
app.mount('#app')
